attributes.additional_details: Mountain the promises that they made during the first pandemic rather than increasing their pay
attributes.background: Recognize financially the hard work that all NHS staff are doing every day risking their lives and not be able to financially supporting themselves of their family and also risking life every single day.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want the Government to recognise the NHS, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
                
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign: 

Provide a Pay increase of 7% to all our NHS workers fighting COVID19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568373

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253

Increase pay for all NHS staff by 15%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565151

We should increase the pay of our NHS staff by 25%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563356

Automatic Yearly Pay Rise For NHS Health Care Workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565256

Pay Covid-19 allowance to NHS doctors and nurses equal to 30% of salary: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552365

To pay every NHS and Social Care Worker in England a £500 "Thank You" Bonus: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562495

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
